clinical_study.brief_title: Surgical Treatment of Peri-implantitis With and Without an Initial Non-surgical Approach
clinical_study.official_title: Surgical Treatment of Peri-implantitis With and Without an Initial Non-surgical Approach: a Multi-center Randomized Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Randomized, surgeon and outcome assessor blinded, multi-centric, superiority trial with two parallel groups and a 1:1 allocation ratio with the aim of comparing the surgical treatment of severe peri-implantitis with or without an initial non surgical approach.

primary_outcome.description: Measured from the mucosal margin to the bottom of the probeable pocket.

arm_group.description: Non surgical approach (NS) followed by surgical treatment (S) of peri-implantitis
Direct surgical approach (S), without a previous non surgical approach
